name: SevTech: Ages
desc: SevTech: Ages is a massive Minecraft modpack packed with content and progression. This pack focuses on providing the player a long-term progression experience with a purpose. SevTech introduces a number of mechanics never before done such as: hiding ore until unlocked, dynamically hidden items and recipes based on progress, new mobs appear as you progress further and much more!
creator: Darkosto (Suggested by Hannok)
